props.Name: Cleave
props.Description: A power attack that will deal the remainer of its damage to the next enemy in line if original target has been slain.

props.Name: Decapitate
props.Description: A wicked strike that slays target non-Monstrous Living creature if it the target fails a Defense roll against your Attack divided by 10 or by 2 if your make this as a Sneak Attack.

props.Name: Dismember
props.Description: A wicked strike that slays target non-Monstrous Living creature if it the target fails a Defense roll against your Attack divided by 10 or by 2 if your make this as a Sneak Attack.

props.Name: Shield Push
props.Action_Tags: Off Hand;Attack Of Opportunity Action;Instant Attack;

props.Name: Cleave (Axe)
props.Description: A power attack that will deal the remainer of its damage to the next enemy in line if original target has been slain.

props.Name: Crush
props.Description: A wicked strike that slays target non-Monstrous Living creature if it the target fails a Defense roll against your Attack divided by 10 or by 2 if your make this as a Sneak Attack.

props.Passives: Deal damage based on target's Weight
props.Name: Knockdown (Polearm)
Guard Mode
props.Description: Unit in Guard Mode has a chance to intercept an attack made on another non-Guarding ally on the same cell, taking the hit but possibly making a counter attack. Ranged attacks and missile spells are harder to block. This mode is continuous, so the unit may act, but will have 50% AP penalty while Guarding. Defend and Alert modes are comptabile with Guard, others will cancel it.

props.Name: Toggle Weapon Set
props.Description: Toggles your weapons to the reserve set. Warning - will leave you empty-handed if there is none! But maybe thatASCII_OPEN8217ASCII_CLOSEs what you want?

props.Name: Defend
props.Description: This Mode renders the unit immobile for 3 seconds and increases Defense dramatically. Does not disable Counter Attacks, increases Block chances by 25%.

props.Name: Meditate
props.Description: This Mode renders the unit immobile for 6 seconds and restores {1} Essence for each half a second spent in this Mode. Use with caution in battle! Use freely outside...

props.Name: Rest
props.Description: This Mode renders the unit immobile for 6 seconds and restores [2] Stamina for each half a second spent in this Mode. Use with caution in battle! Use freely outside...

props.Name: Concentrate
props.Description: This Mode renders the unit immobile for 6 seconds and restores [2] Focus for each half a second spent in this Mode. Use with caution in battle! Use freely outside...

props.Name: Camp
props.Description: Restores the hero fully, applies Rested bonuses to Stamina, Endurance and Focus.
